mapper.select: select ifnull(max(regroup),0) from comment_friend where find_num=#{find_num}
select max(diff) from comment_friend where find_num=#{find_num}
select max(restep) from comment_friend where find_num=#{find_num} and regroup=#{regroup} and diff=#{diff}

select CF.friend_num, CF.find_num, CF.user_num, CF.content, CF.writeday, CF.regroup, CF.restep, CF.relevel, CF.diff, U.name, U.nickname, U.loginid from comment_friend CF INNER JOIN user U ON CF.user_num = U.user_num where find_num=#{find_num} order by CF.regroup asc,CF.diff asc, CF.restep asc, CF.friend_num asc
mapper.update: update comment_friend set restep=restep+1 where regroup=#{regroup} and restep>#{restep}
update comment_friend set restep=restep+2 where regroup=#{regroup} and diff=#{diff} and restep>=#{restep}
update comment_friend set restep=restep-1 where regroup=#{regroup} and restep=#{restep}
update comment_friend set content=#{content} where friend_num=#{friend_num}
